extendedInfo.description: Turn your phone into a real universal remote with IR Universal Remote! You can control your own devices or play a funny prank on your friends. There is no need for any additional software, accounts, or attachments. This application will save you $$$ on replacement batteries alone. The best part is, IR Remote can be updated at anytime with new features and graphics for free! How many of your current universal remotes can do that? This application is meant to be an easier to use Peel and Watch On alternative.*NEW as of 09/05/2013 as Promised- Online Remotes! Over 10,000+ new supported devices! Online Remotes do require an internet connection. I will work on the ability to save remotes locally. (That way you only need an internet connection when you want to save a new remote.) I will also update the graphics to match the original graphics. The online remote section is still in beta and will be updated with many improvements in the near future! I have been working on implementing the online remotes feature for a few weeks now so I have not had the time to respond to all of your emails.. Sorry for that.. there are a lot of user requests and only 1 of me.. I hope this makes up for some of the missed requests! Thanks for all of the positive feedback it really helps! Don't spend hours manually typing IR codes! Simply find the device you want and start clicking with IR Universal Remote!This application was developed for Samsung devices that have an IR Blaster sensor. HTC One is currently not supported.Galaxy S3 is NOT supported. The GS3 does not have an IR Blaster..What users are saying!âââââ Ryan Hastie on Jul 31, 2013 at 9:27 PMAwesome   Works with my 6 series samsung lcd tv. Laziness has come to a whole new level in my life now! Cheers, I can freak my flat mates out now hahaâââââ Jake Melkowski on Jul 21, 2013 at 10:51 PMWorks great!	   I love this app. I always have so much fun in the bars making people wonder why the TVs keep going off!âââââ Jeremy Douglass on Jul 7, 2013 at 11:33 PMNice    Great app dude, was at costco today... im sure you see where this is going, funny seeing everyones reactions when all the tvs start randomly start tuning off haha. ThanksIR Remote was initially built for the Samsung Galaxy S4. Currently Samsung Galaxy devices that have built in IR Blaster sensors are supported. If your phone (or Tablet) has an IR blaster and you would like to try this application on your device then feel free. Search on google first to see if your device has an IR Blaster sensor before trying. Please do not leave spam comments if your device does not have an IR Blaster sensor.Note: IR Remote was not developed by a team or a company. IR Remote was developed by one person who also has a completely separate full time job. I can only build on this application during spare time which is usually the weekends.. I just noticed a lot of emails saying "you guys".. but really it's just me! :) Please.. If you have any trouble using IR Remote or you have a device that is not currently supported, then send me an email. Please do not just leave a poor comment or rating. I will be more than happy to assist you!

reviews.title: SuperHit
reviews.comment: Another TV such as Hisense,T-Home.Please add this kind of Chinese TVs. TaTa sky, Videocon d2h,Dish TV ..... Add this kind of set top box too. Thank
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Half working
reviews.comment: I used it for Panasonic  tv \342\200\246just the volume n power works
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice but...
reviews.comment: Quite cool app.  Use an LG TV.  Can power on and off.  Not much else for now.  Waiting for updates. Hope you\'ll find the time to do dvd and av receivers too one day.
reviews.author: Felix Soh

reviews.title: I assure u this is not spam.
reviews.comment: I tried this on my Sony tv and it didn\'t work. Also tried it on my Time Warner box, nothing. Tried everyone listed, nothing. And I know it\'s not me because WatchOn works with all of my tvs and boxes.
reviews.author: Silvia Rivera

reviews.title: Still after update No respose
reviews.comment: GalxS4 to RCA TV with dvd nothig happens. No contact desingner?  Will rate better if I get A fix response thank you
reviews.author: Pedro De Castro

reviews.title: Easily the best out there
reviews.comment: It\'s free works perfect and never let\'s me down with bugs. Please add a widget and something to attach to the drop down.
reviews.author: Raul Davila

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: It works for my TV! I would love to see bluray remotes added!
reviews.author: Le Grand Catalan

reviews.title: Only powers on...
reviews.comment: I installed it, used it once just fine, went to use it again and now It will only power on devices. Not evenpower them off...
reviews.author: Dante Pappert-Stockton

reviews.title: Great App! Works AS ADVERTISED!!!
reviews.comment: Works great with the Galaxy S4, the phone it was originally developed for. He seems to be willing to work with end users so email him or check that you even have an IR blaster before leaving a poor review.
reviews.author: Dustin Crooke

reviews.title: Awesome! Direct TV?
reviews.comment: Work as it says! Looking forward to Direct TV compatibility for that last star!
reviews.author: Stan Shepp

reviews.title: Great time
reviews.comment: Works great
reviews.author: Anthony Logan

reviews.title: Good. Needs some improvement
reviews.comment: This is a very good app. Especially considering it\'s only one guy.  Updates are fast and new codes get added often. supports every device I have but I can\'t seem to get it to work for my xbox.
reviews.author: Stephen Rasmussen

reviews.title: Good potential but falls short
reviews.comment: This is almost exactly what I want in a remote control app.  Simple interface.  Easy setup.  Only problem is that it needs better support for more devices.  If this had a massive database similar to harmony remotes, I would pay a few dollars for the app. It doesnt have my cable box model.
reviews.author: Derek Lyons

reviews.title: Finally a remote app without the bloating.
reviews.comment: I have this on my galaxy tab 2 7.0, and it works flawlessly.  Only down side is that I was unable to be the first to give thanks to the developer. Great job, I love this over peel all day, every day, foreverrrrrr. Thanks again.
reviews.author: Joseph Burton

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: I love going to any sports bar and change the channel to whatever I wanna watch. Watch On works great for my home but it\'s a pain to set it up every time you wanna use it with a different TV and that\'s where this app shines. Thanks for this app. I will purchase the paid version just as a thank you to the developer.
reviews.author: Magdiel Lopez

reviews.title: Superfluous
reviews.comment: I have an Okano tv and a ps3 so there\'s nothing to use this on.
reviews.author: Derek Elphick

reviews.title: Cwap
reviews.comment: Scaling is a big issue buttons overlap cant use. Galaxy Mega. Thanks for the spam response. Will be looking elsewhere. Oh better to bicker! Smalltime dev.
reviews.author: Ben Oettel

reviews.title: Omg wow!
reviews.comment: Dude this app is AMAZING!  I INSTALLED IT AND CHOOSE MY TV BRAND AND IMMEDIATELY TURNED ON MY TV! I am so impressed by the developer,  kudos and thank you! Would really love the option to access the smart tv functions on my vizio smart tv so I can them on Netflix and Amazon prime,  thank you sooooo much
reviews.author: Rebecca Cox

reviews.title: BRILLIANT MAN
reviews.comment: Work perfect. Best remote app ever. Jst need Ps3. But other than tht I give it a 100 stars!!!!
reviews.author: andres cepeda

reviews.title: 4 stars for now.
reviews.comment: I really wanna be able to use this if I can. Lost my remote for dish network.  Galaxy s2 D710 virgin mobile. Keeps force closing...
reviews.author: Henderson Holston
